front.title: Survey of MPTCP Implementations (blank version for implementers to fill in)

abstract.t: This survey gathers information from people who have implemented MPTCP, in particular to help progress the protocol from Experimental to Standards track. It is currently a draft version, so it should not yet be filled in -- instead, we would like feedback (1) from implementers, whether it needs modifying before you would be able (or prepared to) fill it in, (2) from the WG, suggestions to make it more useful.
